benchmark_details.name: Cross-platform Short-Video (XS-Video)
benchmark_details.overview: We propose the Cross-platform Short-Video (XS-Video) dataset with 381,926 samples from 5 biggest Chinese platforms, including short-video content, post information, interactive information, comment content, and elaborately annotated propagation levels, for short-video propagation analysis.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The goal is to promote the research of Short-video Propagation Influence Rating (SPIR) from both the data and model perspectives.

data.source: Collected from the 5 biggest Chinese platforms (Douyin, Kuaishou, Xigua, Toutiao, Bilibili).
data.annotation: Annotated with the propagation influence from level 0 to 9, based on multi-dimensional interactive indicators.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated from predicted results and ground truth based on classification and regression tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher Accuracy indicates better prediction; lower MSE and MAE indicate better regression performance.
methodology.baseline_results: Compared to the best small GNN (RGCN), our NetGPT model performs best with improved accuracy and reduced error rates.
methodology.validation: Comprehensive experimental results evaluated by both classification and regression metrics.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: User names replaced with anonymous IDs to avoid privacy issues.
